name: INFLATION
description:
A short little game made for the brackeys game jam 2021.2

The early universe was a chaotic place. There were millions of particles moving around at near the speed of light. It couldn't be like this forever though, stars, planets, and galaxies needed to form. That's where you come in.

Controls:

  • Lmb - Shoot
  • Rmb - Cancel Shot
  • R - Restart
